title: Auhmline Studio - Melee Arena SFX
description: "Melee Arena" the Melee Combat Audio Library for your scenes and games, featuring over 1000 versatile sounds ranging from realistic armor wear to immersive impact textures and beyond.
longDescription:
Suitable for close combat scenes and games, a large variety of styles and effects for cartoonish and realistic styles.


Experience the power of the "Melee Arena" the Melee Combat Audio Library for your scenes and games, featuring over 1000 versatile sounds ranging from realistic armor wear to immersive impact textures and beyond. As a bonus it has AI generated Vocal sounds, Breaths, cheers, Grunts and laughs to make your fighting scenes or games come alive. Take your creativity further - invest in the Melee Arena today! package


Listen to the preview instrumental!

https://on.soundcloud.com/F67tE


The storytelling preview will soon be available on all your favorite streaming services @

https://distrokid.com/hyperfollow/auhmlinestudio/melee-arena-close-combat-audio-library



Check out the full detailed item list in the documentation!

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1Psl96zoWxY7w984Or6EswFLp8sR6S8I1?usp=drive_link
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves & Cues: 1245

1069 96khz/24bit Samples

+ Bonus 170 44.1khz/24bit AI Vocal samples

+ 6 48khz/24bit Preview Instrumental Tracks


Armor & Wear 246

Impact Textures 98 (Chain Mail 28, Cloth/Textile 12, Leather 33, Plate 25)

Movements 112 (Chain Mail 28, Cloth/Textile 22, Leather 36, Plate 26)

Rip & Tear 36


Basic Footwork 140

Outdoor Surfaces 50 (Gravel 15, Sand 7, Slide 13, Snow 15)

Surfaces Barefoot 39 (Hardwood Floor 11, Soft/Lift 16, Stone Floor 12)

Surfaces Shoe 51 (Hardwood Floor 19, Soft/Lift 22, Stone Floor 10)


Grapple/Roll 38


Impact Textures 208

Bone 28

Glass 26

Gore/Meat/Flesh/Gush 34 (Blood Gush 12, Flesh 22)

Gravel 12

Metal 35

Sand 10

Wood 63 (Break 23)


Punch/Hit/Thump/Smack/Clash/Thud Impacts 207

Body 66

Clash 37

Smack/Skin 27

Sub 77


Swings 109

Fast 93

Slow 16


Weapon 110

Drop & Throw 54

Metal Ringing 11

Scrape 45


Designed Samples 11

Footwork 5

Martial Art Combos 4

Weapon Combos 2


Bonus AI Voice/Vocal 170 (Breaths, Cheers, Grunts, Laughs)


Preview Instrumental 6


Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 20min 14s

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Important/Additional Notes: These samples are dry! Get the best out of the samples by using filters, EQ, layering and reverb etc.
